name: Pouch
entries: A cloth or leather pouch can hold up to 20 {@item sling bullet|phb|sling bullets} or 50 {@item blowgun needle|phb|blowgun needles}, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a {@item component pouch|phb}. A pouch can hold up to â…• cubic foot or 6 pounds of gear.
